PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-22281998-12-160,  ,  HERITAGE,  , 
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of PIERRE DUFOUR, of Aylmer, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
